discourse_list.title: Article: "DeFi Protocols Heed MakerDAO\xe2\x80\x99s Call to Back DAI with Real-World Assets"

content.content: I am certainly not posting this because I endorse the message but I feel we do need to know what is being said out there about Maker. I don’t know of the author, I have no clue if this is part of someone’s agenda, so I defer to you experts out there. In any event, let’s keep building!    The Defiant – 13 Apr 22    DeFi Protocols Heed MakerDAO’s Call to Back DAI with Real-World Assets - The... Diversifying DAI’s backing outside of crypto could protect DAI from a crypto bear market.  Est. reading time: 2 minutes
It looks like he just aggregated a few other articles into one article, and even kept in some misleading information like the Tesla loan thing.
I wonder if anyone knows these authors. I wonder who is paying them.
